attributes.action: award an honour to Steve Winwood for his services to music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve Winwood has now been in the music business for 43 years starting with Spencer Davis Group through Traffic, Blind Faith and solo work. He is still touring and recording. He is a God fearing Christian and pillar in his community in Gloucestershire.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
